S.FORM: Serzh Azati Sargsyan Mntucing hngkawas 1954 idas 6 jiyax 30 ka Serzh Azati Sargsyan ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Armenia ta sayang o kiya ka Serzh Azati Sargsyan, pnaah hngkawas 2008 idas 4 jiyax 9 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. Soto Armenia Niyi ka patas bnkuwan soto Armenia. Qlahang: Bnkuwan patas hini ka kngkawas 1991 Armenia snpeyyah Suryeyn dukuricu daw hhangan txtaxa bukung qnlhangan. Pnyahan pnatas
